Structs/STList.html#/getItems(completion.abstract: Get the items of the list from back end. The items property of the list is updated with the result of the request when it succeeds.

Structs/STList.html#/update(completion:).name: update(completion:)
Structs/STList.html#/update(completion:).abstract: Update infos of the list (name, type, imSrc) on back end. This method will not sync items.

Structs/STList.html#/updateItems(_:compl.abstract: Update part of items of the list on back end, given by the items parameter. The items property of the list is updated when the request succeeds.

Structs/STList.html#/updateItem(_:comple.abstract: Update one item of the list on back end, given by the item parameter. The items property of the list is updated when the request succeeds.

Structs/STList.html#/deleteItem(_:comple.name: deleteItem(_:completion:)
Structs/STList.html#/deleteItem(_:comple.abstract: Delete one item from a list on back end. The items property of the list is updated when the request succeeds.

Structs/STList.html#/syncItems(completio.name: syncItems(completion:)
Structs/STList.html#/syncItems(completio.abstract: Sync items on back end from the value of the items property of the list.

Structs/STContent.html.name: STContent
Structs/STContent.html.abstract: A structure used to model a list of STTrack associated to a same content.

Structs/STContentLight.html.name: STContentLight
Structs/STContentLight.html.abstract: This structure is a light version of STContent wich includes only the key properties required to display a content.

Structs/STSection.html.name: STSection
Structs/STSection.html.abstract: A structure used to model a group of contents or tracks.

Structs/STTrack.html.name: STTrack
Structs/STTrack.html.abstract: A structure giving an audio source wich is the most elementary model of data for the SDK features.

Structs/STTrackHistoryItem.html.name: STTrackHistoryItem

Structs/STTransaction.html.name: STTransaction

Protocols/STFeature.html#/getInstance().name: getInstance()
Protocols/STFeature.html#/getInstance().abstract: Returns the shared instance of the feature, adn throws an error if your plan doesn’t include this feature

Protocols/STFeature.html#/shared.name: shared
Protocols/STFeature.html#/shared.abstract: Returns the same result as the getInstance() method, without throwing. Can be seen as a shortcut intended to allow a more concise syntax.

Protocols/STFeature.html.name: STFeature
Protocols/STFeature.html.abstract: This protocol is adopted by the various features of the SDK.

Protocols/STPlayerObserver.html.name: STPlayerObserver
Protocols/STPlayerObserver.html.abstract: Use this protocol to observe the following events in the shared instance of STPlayer: change of state, end of a track and failure in playing a track.

Enums/STContentModelType.html.name: STContentModelType

Enums/STTrackTypeOfElement.html.name: STTrackTypeOfElement
